name: Christmas Nightmare
description:
Christmas Nightmare is an atmospheric horror game about New Year's Eve.

Plot: The plot is about just a guy named Connor. All he wants after a hard day at work is to relax on the couch watching his favorite sports show with a bottle of beer.
But this evening is special.
Evening before New Year.

Peculiarities:
  • A short horror game with a total duration of approximately 60 minutes.
  • The atmosphere of celebration will be replaced by an atmosphere of real horror.
  • Traces in the snow.
  • Fireworks
